tool.name: tool_14

param.name: TMIN
param.dialogReference:
Minimum Temperature

Grid list, input

Monthly (12) or daily (365) temperature observations.

param.name: TMAX
param.dialogReference:
Maximum Temperature

Grid list, input

Monthly (12) or daily (365) temperature observations.

param.name: FREQUENCY
param.dialogReference:
Frost Change Frequency

Grid, output

The number of days with frost change.

param.name: DT_MEAN
param.dialogReference:
Mean Temperature Span

Grid, output, optional

optional

Mean daily temperature span of frost change days.

param.name: DT_MAX
param.dialogReference:
Maximum Temperature Span

Grid, output, optional

optional

Maximum daily temperature span of frost change days.

param.name: DT_STDV
param.dialogReference:
Standard Deviation of Temperature Span

Grid, output, optional

optional

Standard deviation of daily temperature span of frost change days.

param.name: TMIN_MEAN
param.dialogReference:
Mean Minimum Temperature

Grid, output, optional

optional

Mean daily minimum temperature of frost change days.

param.name: TMIN_MIN
param.dialogReference:
Minimum Temperature

Grid, output, optional

optional

Coldest daily minimum temperature of all frost change days.

tool.summary: This tool calculates statistics about the frost change frequency either from monthly or daily minimum and maximum temperatures. In case of monthly observations these will be spline interpolated to gain a daily resolution.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Conrad, O., Bechtel, B., Bock, M., Dietrich, H., Fischer, E., Gerlitz, L., Wehberg, J., Wichmann, V., and Boehner, J. (2015): System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses (SAGA) v. 2.1.4, Geosci. Model Dev., 8, 1991-2007, doi:10.5194/gmd-8-1991-2015. [SAGA - System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses - saga-gis.org]
